title: Higher Education Equity Science Education Program Addressing Inequality via Web-Based Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Requires building a flexible learning environment for working professionals, mandating mobile-optimized content, and applying lightweight VR simulations operable on low-spec devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can observe scientific phenomena through VR simulations and reproduce experimental results at least three times.
Learners can propose at least one solution to address educational inequality based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
